entries.title: Chapter 1 Official Trailer
entries.info:
### Description

The official trailer for **ENigmatic Recollection**, released on August 23rd, 2024.

The trailer offers a broad introduction to the **Kingdom of Libestal** and its heroes, each summoned to this world, cloaked in Libestal’s colors, seen wandering, exploring, venturing forth, and conquering enemies and dungeons alike.

> It is a collection of stories in which the members of hololive English play a part.
> Through streams, animations, and songs wrought anew, immerse yourself in fresh narratives woven from myriad realms beyond.

At the time of its release, no one truly knew what this project would become, but even this glimpse alone was enough to ignite immense excitement throughout the community.

title: Chapter 1 REWIND
description: A series of videos recapping moments of the chapter
info:
### Description

In anticipation of Chapter Two, and to give everyone a chance to relive the events of the first chapter, a series of recap videos was released daily from **April 24 - April 26, 2025**, highlighting memorable moments from the adventure.

title: Memory Recollections
description: Collection of memories recovered in the first chapter

entries.title: Recollection - Mori Calliope
entries.info:
### General

Mori Calliope’s memories were recovered after the conquest of the Underworld Dungeon, which took place on the first day of the first chapter.

As the apprentice of Death, the pink-haired grim reaper’s duty had always been to claim souls, using them as sustenance for those in the underworld.

Yet deep within her heart, she had long harbored doubts about this way of existence. One day, she discovered that instead of harvesting souls, human emotions, specifically their happiness, could serve the same purpose. Rejecting her grim role as a bringer of death, she chose instead to become someone who brings joy to others.

entries.title: Recollection - Gawr Gura
entries.info:
### General

Gawr Gura’s memories were recovered after the conquest of the Underwater Dungeon, which took place on the second day of the first chapter.

Bored to death by the monotonous life of the underwater kingdom where she once dwelled, day after day slipping into dull routine, the shark girl finally snapped. Stealing the all-powerful trident, she fled to the surface, where her thrilling new life truly began.

entries.title: Recollection - Ninomae Ina'nis
entries.info:
### General

Ninomae Ina'nis’ memories were recovered after the conquest of the Eldritch Horror Dungeon, which took place on the third day of the first chapter.

A lone girl residing in a shrine—an area eerie and unsettling, yet softened by the gentle, kind aura she exuded. A priestess of compassion and grace, Ina was tasked with guiding lost souls to their rest. She would play with them, spend time by their side, ensuring that each could pass on peacefully.

entries.title: Recollection - Takanashi Kiara
entries.info:
### Description

Takanashi Kiara’s memories were recovered after the conquest of the Volcano Dungeon, which took place on the fourth day of the first chapter.

Born an immortal, fiery phoenix with a legacy as a warrior who single-handedly brought down countless armies. And now? Upon seeing a business drowning in debt and on the verge of collapse, she stepped in—first as an employee, then as the savior who turned it all around. Today, she stands as the radiant owner of this beloved fast-food franchise.

entries.title: Recollection - Amelia Watson
entries.info:
### Description

Amelia Watson’s memories were recovered after the conquest of the Ancient Sewers Dungeon, which took place on the fifth day of the first chapter.

A detective always chasing the next big case, yet every mystery she encountered turned out to be trivial drama at best. She longed for something grand—the case of the century! But when she finally believed she had found it while investigating four mysterious figures, she discovered that they were not villains or myths, but simply kindhearted people.

Nonetheless, the revelation left her content. For big or small, it was the thrill of uncovering the truth that brought her joy. After all, she was _the_ number one detective.

title: Official Theme Song
description: An energetic start to an enigmatic journey

entries.title: START AGAIN - Chapter 1 Theme Song
entries.info:
### Description

The official theme song for Chapter 1, featuring Calli, Ina, IRyS, and Elizabeth, released on August 31st, 2024 — the day before the official beginning of this enigmatic journey.

The song carries a fun, upbeat vibe — an energetic, self-affirming anthem that sets the stage for this incredible journey. Throughout the song, the general theme resembles a declaration of unwavering resolve and renewed confidence, both literal (for the characters who lost their memories) and metaphorical (for facing any new challenge in life or a new creative venture).

It shows that even after getting lost, they can find their way, unite, and rise stronger than before. Hence, **"START AGAIN."**

title: Lady Bloodflame's Inner Reflections
description: Liz's daily recollects of events that've transpired thus far
info:
### Description

During the first chapter, at the start of each day while waiting to "wake up," Lady Bloodflame would experience flashes of moments that had transpired in the days before.

From her promise to Mococo on the first day to her mental breakdown after Nerissa declared she hated the red knight, these flashes, illustrated through rough, simple, yet captivating sketches, captured the moments that lingered in the scarlet knight’s mind. They shaped her character and offered the voices watching her journey a deeper glimpse into her psyche and thoughts.

title: ENigmatic Recollection Chapter 2 Ending Animation
description: The ending sequence of the second chapter

entries.title: ENigmatic Recollection Chapter 2 - Ending
entries.info:
### Description

Fia came to accept that preventing the Outsider’s birth was impossible. The only path left was to stop whatever his intentions were in the present.

Once more, she called upon the heroes for help. And without hesitation, they answered. They were heroes, after all—if the world needed saving, they would rise to the call, no matter how many times it came.

But not all of them stepped forward.

Fuwawa, Mococo, Bijou, Nerissa, and Shiori stayed behind, shrouded in shadow.

Tired of being commanded, tired of living roles written by others, they declared rebellion. They would forge their own path. Do things *their* way.

title: Miscellaneous - Chapter 2
description: Media and streams related to the second chapter

entries.title: ENigmatic Recollection Chapter 2 Game Trailer
entries.info:
### Description

Released just hours before the first day of the second chapter began, the official game trailer offered a glimpse into the world the heroes would soon traverse.

Filled with shots of dungeons, cryptic dialogue lines, and a strikingly cinematic tone, the trailer set a dramatic stage for what would soon unfold into a glorious storm of chaos once the real adventure began.

entries.title: ENigmatic Recollection - A New Chapter
entries.info:
### Description

Shown on May 3, 2025, the day before the start of the second chapter, this stream, featuring Kronii, Bijou, Nerissa, Ina and Calli, was to introduce and announce official info and what to expect of the second chapter.

The stream held many fun activities, such as guessing songs, dancing, and answering questions as a balloon gets larger and larger, so large it traumatized Bijou and Calli.

title: ENreco NEWS
description: A daily series recapping the events of the second chapter
info:
### Description

Taking place on the first, fourth, and seventh days of Chapter Two, this series of short streams—hosted by Calli and Kiara—served to recap the events of the previous days, helping everyone stay up to date as the story unfolded.

The broadcasts featured fan-made clips highlighting funny moments, readings of journals written by the heroes, and announcements of upcoming dungeons and events scheduled for the day.

title: Recollections
description: Collection of memories recovered in the second chapter

entries.title: Recollections - IRyS
entries.info:
### Description

IRyS’ memories were recovered after the conquest of the Star Site: Elpis, which took place on the second day of the second chapter.

A Nephilim born from the war between Angels and Demons, her purpose was to bring an end to their conflict. With her beautiful voice and mesmerizing songs, she united both factions—a being many came to call “a goddess,” albeit an alcoholic one.

entries.title: Recollections - Ouro Kronii
entries.info:
### Description

Ouro Kronii’s memories were recovered after the conquest of the Star Site: Chronos, which took place on the fourth day of the second chapter.

The Warden of Time itself—the keeper of the timeline, mender of fractures, and corrector of anomalies across dimensions. She maintained the flow of time and upheld the stability of the multiverse.

entries.title: Recollections - Hakos Baelz
entries.info:
### Description

Hakos Baelz’s memories were recovered after the conquest of the Star Site: Chaos, which took place on the sixth day of the second chapter.

A rat? A genie? A crazy red woman? Whatever she was didn’t matter—her mere presence was enough to plunge everything around her into chaos. She was energetic, she was powerful, she was chaos itself. With a roll of her dice, reality bent to her will, granting both her and those around her whatever wishes they desired.

title: Official Theme Song
description: In the mirror, you see the darkest side of you

entries.title: MONSTER - Chapter 2 Theme Song
entries.info:
### Description

Released on May 3, 2025, *MONSTER* is the official theme song for the second chapter of **ENigmatic Recollection**, featuring Gigi, Ina, Kronii, and Shiori.

An intense electronic rock track infused with disorienting, jazz-inflected harmonic instability, it perfectly captures the project’s chaotic, high-stakes lore. Lyrically, it explores the **erosion of identity** and the struggle to confront the **inner “monster”**—not an external enemy, but the darkest, fragmented side of oneself screaming from within.

Visually speaking, the song is strikingly well-animated, filled with subtle symbolism tied to the overarching story of the second chapter—most notably, the final sequence where four cards representing the heroes are shown, and only Shiori’s is turned over, by her own hand.

entries.title: Chapter 2 - Loading Screen
entries.info:
### Description

This loading screen was used by all the talents as they prepared to begin their day in Chapter 2. It features a looping animation of a spinning tarot card, with each rotation revealing a different hero, set against a starry, mystical backdrop.

The background music is the instrumental version of **MONSTER**, the official theme song of Chapter 2.

title: Immerkind's Serenade
description: A confession of love from the kindest one

entries.title: Oh Princess
entries.info:
### Description

After days of bottling up her emotions, Cecilia finally found the courage. On the sixth day of the second chapter, she poured all her feelings into a heartfelt serenade — a confession of love to the princess she had long admired and devoted herself to.

title: Knight's Log
description: Lady Bloodflame's daily journal of her second journey
info:
### Description

Starting from the second day onward, we see Lady Bloodflame in her office, writing and reading aloud her daily journal—or as she called it, the "Knight’s Log."

These logs recorded the events she had experienced the day before, but more importantly, how those moments had affected her. As she reminisced and reflected, her thoughts grew deeper and more contemplative—about herself, about those around her, and above all, about what it truly meant to be a knight.
